Plot: A British medical doctor fights a cholera epidemic in a small Chinese village, while being trapped at home in a loveless marriage to an unfaithful wife.
Title: The Painted Veil
Actors: Catherine An, Bin Li, Bin Wu, Alan David
tomatoConsensus: Visually, The Painted Veil has all the trappings of a stuffy period drama, but Norton's and Watts's deft portrayals of imperfect, complicated characters give the film a modern-day spark.
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 8 wins & 11 nominations.
